ayahs.textUthmani: وَإِن يَمْسَسْكَ ٱللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُۥٓ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ وَإِن يُرِدْكَ بِخَيْرٍ فَلَا رَآدَّ لِفَضْلِهِۦ ۚ يُصِيبُ بِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَإِن [And if] يَمْسَسْكَ [Allah touches you] ٱللَّهُ [Allah touches you] بِضُرٍّۢ [with adversity] فَلَا [(there is) no] كَاشِفَ [remover] لَهُۥٓ [of it] إِلَّا [except] هُوَ ۖ [Him] وَإِن [and if] يُرِدْكَ [He intends for you] بِخَيْرٍۢ [any good] فَلَا [then (there is) no] رَآدَّ [repeller] لِفَضْلِهِۦ ۚ [(of) His Bounty] يُصِيبُ [He causes it to reach] بِهِۦ [He causes it to reach] مَن [whom] يَشَآءُ [He wills] مِنْ [of] عِبَادِهِۦ ۚ [His slaves] وَهُوَ [And He] ٱلْغَفُورُ [(is) the Oft-Forgiving] ٱلرَّحِيمُ [the Most Merciful]
ayahs.transliteration: Wa-in yamsaska Allahu bidurrinfala kashifa lahu illa huwa wa-in yuridkabikhayrin fala radda lifadlihi yuseebubihi man yashao min AAibadihi wahuwa alghafooru arraheem

ayahs.textUthmani: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدْ جَآءَكُمُ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكُمْ ۖ فَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَهْتَدِى لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَإِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيْهَا ۖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيْكُم بِوَكِيلٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا [O mankind] ٱلنَّاسُ [O mankind] قَدْ [Verily] جَآءَكُمُ [has come to you] ٱلْحَقُّ [the truth] مِن [from] رَّبِّكُمْ ۖ [your Lord] فَمَنِ [So whoever] ٱهْتَدَىٰ [(is) guided] فَإِنَّمَا [then only] يَهْتَدِى [(he is) guided] لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ [for his soul] وَمَن [and whoever] ضَلَّ [goes astray] فَإِنَّمَا [then only] يَضِلُّ [he strays] عَلَيْهَا ۖ [against it] وَمَآ [And I am not] أَنَا۠ [And I am not] عَلَيْكُم [over you] بِوَكِيلٍۢ [a guardian]
ayahs.transliteration: Qul ya ayyuha annasuqad jaakumu alhaqqu min rabbikum famani ihtadafa-innama yahtadee linafsihi waman dalla fa-innamayadillu AAalayha wama ana AAalaykumbiwakeel

ayahs.textUthmani: وَٱتَّبِعْ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيْكَ وَٱصْبِرْ حَتَّىٰ يَحْكُمَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلْحَـٰكِمِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱتَّبِعْ [And follow] مَا [what] يُوحَىٰٓ [is revealed] إِلَيْكَ [to you] وَٱصْبِرْ [and be patient] حَتَّىٰ [until] يَحْكُمَ [Allah gives judgment] ٱللَّهُ ۚ [Allah gives judgment] وَهُوَ [And He] خَيْرُ [(is) the Best] ٱلْحَـٰكِمِينَ [(of) the Judges]
ayahs.transliteration: WattabiAA ma yoohailayka wasbir hatta yahkumaAllahu wahuwa khayru alhakimeen

ayahs.textUthmani: الٓر ۚ كِتَـٰبٌ أُحْكِمَتْ ءَايَـٰتُهُۥ ثُمَّ فُصِّلَتْ مِن لَّدُنْ حَكِيمٍ خَبِيرٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: الٓر ۚ [Alif Lam Ra] كِتَـٰبٌ [(This is) a Book] أُحْكِمَتْ [are perfected] ءَايَـٰتُهُۥ [its Verses] ثُمَّ [moreover] فُصِّلَتْ [explained in detail] مِن [from (he One Who)] لَّدُنْ [from (he One Who)] حَكِيمٍ [(is) All-Wise] خَبِيرٍ [All-Aware]
ayahs.transliteration: Alif-lam-ra kitabun ohkimatayatuhu thumma fussilat min ladun hakeeminkhabeer

ayahs.textUthmani: أَلَّا تَعْبُدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّنِى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ وَبَشِيرٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَلَّا [That "Not] تَعْبُدُوٓا۟ [you worship] إِلَّا [but] ٱللَّهَ ۚ [Allah] إِنَّنِى [Indeed, I am] لَكُم [to you] مِّنْهُ [from Him] نَذِيرٌۭ [a warner] وَبَشِيرٌۭ [and a bearer of glad tidings]
ayahs.transliteration: Alla taAAbudoo illa Allahainnanee lakum minhu natheerun wabasheer

words.translation: and a bearer of glad tidings

ayahs.textUthmani: وَأَنِ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓا۟ إِلَيْهِ يُمَتِّعْكُم مَّتَـٰعًا حَسَنًا إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى وَيُؤْتِ كُلَّ ذِى فَضْلٍ فَضْلَهُۥ ۖ وَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَإِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ كَبِيرٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَأَنِ [And that] ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ [Seek forgiveness] رَبَّكُمْ [(of) your Lord] ثُمَّ [and] تُوبُوٓا۟ [turn in repentance] إِلَيْهِ [to Him] يُمَتِّعْكُم [He will let you] مَّتَـٰعًا [enjoy] حَسَنًا [a good] إِلَىٰٓ [for] أَجَلٍۢ [a term] مُّسَمًّۭى [appointed] وَيُؤْتِ [And give] كُلَّ [(to) every] ذِى [owner] فَضْلٍۢ [(of) grace] فَضْلَهُۥ ۖ [His Grace] وَإِن [But if] تَوَلَّوْا۟ [you turn away] فَإِنِّىٓ [then indeed, I] أَخَافُ [fear] عَلَيْكُمْ [for you] عَذَابَ [(the) punishment] يَوْمٍۢ [(of) a Great Day] كَبِيرٍ [(of) a Great Day]
ayahs.transliteration: Waani istaghfiroo rabbakum thumma toobooilayhi yumattiAAkum mataAAan hasanan ilaajalin musamman wayu/ti kulla thee fadlin fadlahuwa-in tawallaw fa-inee akhafu AAalaykum AAathabayawmin kabeer

ayahs.textUthmani: إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَرْجِعُكُمْ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِلَى [To] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] مَرْجِعُكُمْ ۖ [(is) your return] وَهُوَ [and He] عَلَىٰ [(is) on] كُلِّ [every] شَىْءٍۢ [thing] قَدِيرٌ [All-Powerful]
ayahs.transliteration: Ila Allahi marjiAAukum wahuwaAAala kulli shay-in qadeer

ayahs.textUthmani: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمْ يَثْنُونَ صُدُورَهُمْ لِيَسْتَخْفُوا۟ مِنْهُ ۚ أَلَا حِينَ يَسْتَغْشُونَ ثِيَابَهُمْ يَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayahs.wordByWord: أَلَآ [No doubt] إِنَّهُمْ [They] يَثْنُونَ [fold up] صُدُورَهُمْ [their breasts] لِيَسْتَخْفُوا۟ [that they may hide] مِنْهُ ۚ [from Him] أَلَا [Surely] حِينَ [when] يَسْتَغْشُونَ [they cover (themselves)] ثِيَابَهُمْ [(with) their garments] يَعْلَمُ [He knows] مَا [what] يُسِرُّونَ [they conceal] وَمَا [and what] يُعْلِنُونَ ۚ [they reveal] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, He] عَلِيمٌۢ [(is) All-Knower] بِذَاتِ [of what] ٱلصُّدُورِ [(is in) the breasts]
ayahs.transliteration: Ala innahum yathnoona sudoorahumliyastakhfoo minhu ala heena yastaghshoona thiyabahumyaAAlamu ma yusirroona wama yuAAlinoona innahuAAaleemun bithati assudoor
